newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian leu 4,771 to dollar for Jan 16 - BNR.
newsitem.headline: Romanian leu 4,771 to dollar for Jan 16 - BNR.

text.p: Romania's National Bank (BNR) announced the leu's reference rate at 4,771 to the dollar for January 16.
This reference rate was set on Tuesday as a weighted average based on daily reports of foreign exchange operators. It is a guidance rate used for statistical accounting purposes.
The leu's reference rate set on Monday for January 15 is 4,513 to the dollar. It was 4,363 on Tuesday. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
